name: B-612
description:
Summary

B-612 is an adaptation of The Little Prince as real-time strategy game. Life can be lonely on the tiny planet, and it sure ain't easy. Clean out volcanoes, chop baobab sprouts, water the rose, before they leave the prince without a place to call home.


Controls

Mouse 🖱️

Rotate planetLeft hold + drag Actions
Double left click
